pr_title: [CDAP-16869] Create a page for outputs configuration [output-name only] (plugin JSON creator)

timeline.author: elfenheart

replies.bodyText: This should be ok! It's a linting change I missed in my previous PR, but is included in a separate PR (which I'll close if this gets merged first).
replies.author: yukiej

replies.bodyText: Oops! VS code must have done this automatically. I will exclude this change from the PR soon, since I saw that @yukiej's PR was out yesterday!
replies.author: jennac3
